short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tabs with a personalized slideshow of your favorite photos, and stay organized with a built-in task manager!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "ADK New Tab" transforms your new tab experience with a sleek and efficient design, bringing you powerful features for productivity and personalization. Stay on top of your tasks with an intuitive to-do list, save your favorite images directly in the extension for daily inspiration, and enjoy an organized and visually refreshing workspace every time you open a new tab. Perfect for those who want a blend of functionality and style in every click. Get started with ADK New Tab and make each tab a productive start!
